curam.util.message.impl
Class CURAMXMLExceptionCreator

java.lang.Object
  curam.util.message.impl.CURAMXMLExceptionCreator

public final class CURAMXMLExceptionCreator
extends java.lang.Object

Helper class to create strongly-typed exceptions from the CURAMXML message catalog.
